content.text:
[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519) 

Time zones are great! I woke up this morning and saw the notification about a bug, but after scrolling a bit it looks like you resolved everything. Just updated to the latest Patchbay and everything seems to be working great. My /inbox is working again! Thanks for defending the fort while *some* of us are deep asleep. :zzz:
